mapper.select: SELECT SKD_NO, SKD_START, SKD_END, SKD_CATEGORY, SKD_TITLE, SKD_CONTENTS, SKD_COLOR, DEPT_NO, EMP_NO FROM (SELECT S.SKD_NO, S.SKD_START, S.SKD_END, S.SKD_CATEGORY, S.SKD_TITLE, S.SKD_CONTENTS, S.SKD_COLOR, E.DEPT_NO, E.EMP_NO FROM EMPLOYEE E INNER JOIN SCHEDULE S ON E.EMP_NO = S.EMP_NO)
